resources.string: You can find bellow the list of elements you are able to view.

For being able to consult your data on the field, you need to first download the data and forms. To do so, please use the \"Import\" bouton presentend bellow and follow instructions then come back here.

For being able to consult your data on the field, you need to first download the data and forms. To do so, please use the \"Import\" bouton presentend bellow and follow instructions then come back here.
You are using the MapMint application for Monitoring and Evaluation called MapMint4ME.

For being able to consult your data on the field, you need to first download the data and forms. To do so, please use the \"Import\" bouton presentend bellow and follow instructions then come back here.

Before going on the field to record new data, make sure to download the latest version of the data and forms byt using the \"Import\" tool. Then, you can start recording new value within the MapMint4ME application.
Once you have accomplished your mission, meaning that you return back with data acquired on the field. Then you can use this tool to upload your data back to your MapMint server.
You don\'t have any MapMint server registred yet, please create one.
